channel.title: A few silly, minor issues
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wo1BhIeHMBo[/url]
0:57 -Xen Jump Pads bounce any prop_physics, including mortar bombs, which is just silly.
1:19 -You can have the guard teleport but his response is kind of out of place.
2:00 -Objects stuck between the moving parts can disrupt their timing.

item.title: A few silly, minor issues
item.dc:creator: Dave847
item.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wo1BhIeHMBo

0:57 -Xen Jump Pads bounce any prop_physics, including mortar bombs, which is just silly.

1:19 -You can have the guard teleport but his response is kind of out of place.

2:00 -Objects stuck between the moving parts can disrupt their timing.
